:::Sharpedge/Jetstorm:::

Sharpedge: I got a question Deemos.  Are we PART of the alliance, or 
just ALLIED with the Alliance?  Is it gonna be like when we were with 
the Maximals or different?
Jetstorm: yeah and do we take orders from you or Zardus?




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Deemos looks to Sharpedge and Jetstorm.
> 
> Deemos: It's okay, we were just fighting with these weakling bots 
who were attacking the old Alliance's base, but I dare them to come 
back now! That's when the fun happens.
> 
> Deemos was not at all aware that his mission was being screwed up 
by Clash at the moment...

> 
>   :::Jetstorm/Sharpedge/Treadshot/Hurricane::: 
> 
>   ::They realize that the base had landed and walk outside.  
Jetstorm and 
>   Sharpedge find there comrades:: 
>   Sharpedge: Sorry for not coming with you Deemos. 
>   Jetstorm: Yeah, We got stuck in the base when it took off 
>   Sharpedge: Any thing we can do to help? 
>   ::Treadshot and Hurricane start digging, as Zardus ordered::
